OOC: Ok so it took a long time to get moved and get my internet back, but alas, RoboRick is back! Now, I've been out of the loop for far too long and there was no way in hell I was gunna read those 300 emails, so could I get a summary of whats gone down in the RPG since I've been away. After I'm up to date, I'll reclaim my chars. By the way, what is my current status with the Council?


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
